transcript:
Hello?
Hello.
Hello.
Hanji sir, namaste, mai IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu, Anand Bajpai.
Excuse me.
Uh sir you have raised uh like you have connected on Hemant Kumar. Uh is are you facing any issue from IndiaMART sir?
Actually we are not getting calls and leads in the IndiaMART. Can you check what is?
Uh just be on call sir for one minute, I'll be checking it.
Maybe today today onwards it will go online Hemant Hemant bol diya hai. Maybe today onwards you are getting calls.
No, just be on call sir, I'll let you know. Just one minute.

So sir do you deal in frozen chicken, soya meal, yellow maize, maze seeds in all these products sir?
Han sir.
Okay. So let me tell you sir actually right now just now like day before yesterday your services has been started. So uh instantly you won't get any call from IndiaMART. It will take nearby at least one week. The uh the you will be getting 17 buyleads from IndiaMART. Uh the more you will using the buyleads the more you will getting the calls and inquiries from the IndiaMART.
Okay.
Okay. So right now actually your services has been just started. So your listing is right now zero. So after one week you will be for example you will be getting in leads of 17 buyleads from IndiaMART. So the more you will be consuming that buylead the more calls and inquiries you will be getting from IndiaMART.
Okay sir.
Uh sir one second sir give me give me 10 minutes I'll call you back.
I'll call you back.
Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting calls and leads in IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Services started recently, takes a week to reflect.

- More buyleads used, more calls and inquiries received.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None
